loans.name: Sharifamo

texts.ru: Шарифамо 30 лет. Она замужем, но не имеет детей. Шарифамо трудолюбивая и жизнерадостная женщина. Она несколько лет назад работала продавщицей в парфюмерном магазине и имеет опыт по купле продаже товаров. Она участвовала на курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованного Ассоциация Деловых Женщин и решила организовать свой бизнес. Она хочет организовать свой бизнес купле продажей женской и детской одежды. Она будет справляться с бизнесом сама. Она будет очень успешной бизнес леди, так как она очень умная и шустрая женщина. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5500 сомон для покупки женских и детских одежд. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sharifamo is 30 years old, married but has no children. She is a hard working and optimistic woman. She has worked as a salesperson in a perfume store for a few years and has experience with retail. Sharifamo participated in the "Achieve Success" class organized by the Association of Businesswomen and decided to start her own business. She wants to open a women and children clothing store and is planning to manage it herself. Sharifamo will be a successful businesswoman because she is a very smart and energetic woman. She is requesting a loan of 5500 somoni to purchase women's a children's clothing for her store. Sharifamo awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy woman and children clothes for organizing a new business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia is 62 years old and married. She has six children. She is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. She has been raising pigs for eight years.

Alicia requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF. She will use the loan funds to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has borrowed seven times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva, to sustain her business activity. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream:  to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mavluda

texts.ru: Мавлуда женщина с прекрасной душой. Она разведена и имеет 1 сына. Сыну 26 лет и не имеет постоянное место работы. Мавлуда более 12 лет работает уборщицей в бане. Она очень трудолюбивая и выполняет свое дело очень хорошо. Мавлуда получает очень маленькую зарплату и ели-ели справляется с расходами. Сын Мавлуды хочет уехать в Российскую Федерацию, чтобы найти работу. Он планирует заработанные деньги, отправить своей матери, чтобы она смогла купить все не обходимые средства для проживания и таким образом улучшить условию проживания. Мавлуда очень обрадовалась, когда узнала о его плане. Сын Мавлуды попросил купить ему авиабилет. Мавлуда обратилась в ИМОН за займом, так как сама не имеет сбережения. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки авиабилета для сына. Мавлуда и ее сын ждут вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mavluda is a woman with a wonderful soul. She is divorced and has one son. Her son is 26 years old and has no regular work. Mavluda has worked as a cleaning lady in a bathhouse for 12 years. She is very hard working and performs her duties well. Mavluda has a very small salary which is barely enough for living. Mavluda's son wants to travel to Russia to find work there. He is planning to send his earning to his mother so that she is able to buy herself what she needs and have a better life. Mavluda was very happy when she learned about her son's decision. Her son asked his mother to buy him airfare. Mavluda has turned to IMON for a loan since she has no savings of her own. She is requesting 3000 somoni to purchase an airplane ticket for her son. Mavluda and her son await your kindness.

loans.use: to buy air ticket for her son who wants to find work in Russia

loans.name: Portia

texts.en:
Portia is appyling for a second loan to support her last year and a half of studies at Maharishi Institute. She will graduate in December 2014. When asked about her progress since the first Kiva loan, Portia reports:

"The first loan has helped me to stop worrying about tuition fees and focus on studying hard and excelling in my studies. I've been passing with excellent marks in all the courses that I've done. The loan has lifted the weight on my shoulders as I had some financial constraints."

video.title: Kiva Borrower Portia from South Africa

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Bhebeth

texts.en:
Bhebeth is 34 years old and married, with five children, two of whom are in school. Bhebeth works very hard to provide for them.

Bhebeth runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a PHP 14,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy food and household goods, like canned goods, soap, shampoo, spices, and eggs to sell.

Bhebeth has been in this business for three years. In the future, Bhebeth would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy food and household goods, like canned goods, soap, shampoo, spices, and eggs to sell.

loans.name: Alogojesuton 3 Group

texts.fr: Le groupement ALOGOJESUTON 3 est composé de vingt trois personnes qui vivent dans le même quartier. C'est la deuxième fois que ce groupement sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. La représentante de ce groupement, du nom de Félicité est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Félicité est âgée de 61 ans et vit au Bénin. Félicité n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Félicité est mariée à un certain Jonas. Le couple a quatre enfants tous scolarisés. Le couple assure ensemble les diverses charges de la maison. Afin de contribuer aux diverses charges, Félicité vend depuis dix ans, des tissus et des sacs par le système de distribution.  Félicité s’approvisionne dans une région du Bénin et aussi au Togo. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Félicité sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupement ALOGOJESUTON 3, un deuxième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Le premier prêt a été bien remboursé.
texts.en:
The Alogojesuton 3 group is composed of 23 individuals living in the same neighborhood. It is the second time that the group is seeking financial support of ALIDC”e in order to expand its business. The group’s representative, by the name of Félicité, is the one raising her hand in the photo. Félicité is 61 years old and lives in Benin. She did not attend school. Her husband’s name is Jonas. They have four children, all of whom [have attended]  school. 
The spouses jointly provide for various household needs. In order to  contribute to various expenses, for 10 years Félicité has been selling fabric and bags through a distribution system. She stocks up in one of the regions of Benin as well as in Togo. With the goal of meeting customer demand and increasing her sales volume and her revenues, Félicité, together with the other members of the Alogojesuton 3 group, is seeking a second loan from ALIDe. The first loan has been duly repaid.

loans.use: to buy fabric and bags.

loans.name: Justa Del Carmen

texts.es: Doña Justa es una mujer microempresaria tiene 40 años de edad, acompañada, desde hace tres años se dedica a la compra de cosechas de tamarindo, tiene de ser cliente con la institución dos años, el producto lo acopia en las comarcas para luego comercializarlos en los diferentes mercados de la capital, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cinco palos de tamarindo, para luego quitarle la cascara para después comercializarlos por quintal.
texts.en:
Justa del Carmen is a 40-year-old, small-businesswoman who lives with her partner. She has worked for three years purchasing tamarind crops.
She has been a lender with the field partner for two years.
She gathers the tamarind pods in rural areas and then sells them in different markets of the capital. She will invest her loan money in the purchase of five units of tamarind pods. She will later remove the shells before selling them by the quintal.

loans.use: to purchase five units of tamarind pods

loans.name: Rhina Yubelkis

texts.es:
Rhina tiene 30 años de edad, soltera y con dos niños de 2 y 4 años de edad. Aprendió el arte de hacer, poner y decorar uñas acrílicas como un medio de genera ingresos. Inició su negocio porque le gusta y es algo que está siendo muy usado por mujeres jóvenes y adultas. 
Actualmente tiene una mesa y algunos equipos para poner las uñas y lo hace en su misma casa. También mandó a hacer  un letrero que lo tiene en el frente de su casa como publicidad, donde muestra algunas de las cosas que les ofrece a sus clientes. Ella está solicitando un préstamo de 10,600 pesos para comprar materiales como: uñas de distintas formas y tamaños, esmalte de varios colores, removedor de esmalte, algodón y además algunos aparatos que sirven para pulir las uñas y limarlas.
texts.en:
Rhina is 30 years old and is a single mother of two children, ages 2 and 4. She learned the art of making, applying and decorating acrylic nails to generate income. She started her business because she likes them, and it is something that is worn by many teenagers and women.
 
Currently, she has a table and some equpment to apply nails and make them in her house. She also has a sign in front of her house advertising some of the things she provides her clients.

She is requesting a loan of 10,600 pesos to buy materials such as: nails of different shapes and sizes, a variety of colors of enamel, nail polish remover, cotton, and some equipment that is used to polish and file the nails.

loans.use: to buy products and equipment for acrylic nails.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for tuition fees and living expenses at the Maharishi Institute.

loans.name: Benkadi Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq  membres du groupe BENKADI sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 33  ans, et  en moyenne 3 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des  familles monogamiques à OUAYERMA I, un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso (3ème région administrative du Mali). 
Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. 
KADIA  1ere à accroupie à droite sur la photo fait le commerce de friperie dans ce groupe de femmes BENKADI, sa renommée en la matière fait d’elle une vendeuse très sollicitée. 
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt  deux balles de friperies qu’elle revendra en détail, de façon ambulante et en famille au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako et souvent au grand marché de Sikasso ville.
Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 17.500 FCFA dont une partie sera  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour mon épargne .
texts.en:
The five members of the BENKADI group are married women with an average age of 33, and an average of 3 children each. They live mostly in monogamous families in OUAYERMA I, one of the neighborhoods of the city of Sikasso (3rd administrative region of Mali).
They are requesting their first loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to meet the needs of their customers.
KADIA, who is squatting on the right of the photo, is the featured borrower in the BENKADI group of women. She trades second-hand clothing and her excellent reputation in this line of work makes her a much sought-after saleswoman.
She intends to use the loan to buy two bales of used clothing that she will sell retail as a street trader and from her home for cash and for credit to a customer-base consisting of both men and women. She gets her supplies from Bamako and often from the big market in the city of Sikasso.
She would like to generate an average monthly profit of 17,500 FCFA- She will use a part of the money to pay back the loan with interest and she will put the rest into savings.

loans.use: To buy bales of second-hand clothing

loans.name: Habiza

texts.ru: Хабиза 40 года. Она за мужем и имеет 4 детей. Хабиза более 15 лет занимается изготовлением лепешки. Она имеет свой цех, где она печет лепешки. В течение 200-260 штук лепешки в день. Она имеет своих клиентов, которые покупают ее лепешки. Ее муж и старшая дочь помогают ей введение бизнеса. Хабиза хочет развевать свой бизнес дальше, но не имеет денег для покупки муки, чтобы печь больше лепешки и таким образом развевать бизнес. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 7000 сомони для покупки муки. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Habiza is 40 years old, married and has four children. She has been baking flat bread for sale for 15 years. Habiza has her own bakery where she makes flat bread, about 200-260 flat breads per day. She has regular clients who buy from her. Habiza's husband and eldest daughter help manage the bakery. Habiza wants to further expand her business but has no savings to buy more flour so that she can bake more flat bread and so expand her business. She is requesting a loan of 7000 somoni to purchase flour in bulk. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to purchase flour for making flatbread

loans.name: Salvatore

texts.en:
Salvatore arrived from Peru in the United States fifteen years ago. Salvatore is a Black Belt in Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and he has received many international awards such as: second place in European Tournament IBJJ, 2 bronze medals in the Pan-American, and others. 

Salvatore is a Graphic Designer and works part-time in his own business, SeinsiUSA. He created his own brand of Jiu Jitsu kimonos and began to market the kimonos successfully a year ago. Salvatore sells his kimonos through two distributors located in Maryland and Florida, and is currently opening up markets in Holland and Sweden. 

Salvatore not only distributes the kimonos, but also offers the logo design and printing on the kimonos, customizing them based on the client’s needs. Salvatore is a single man, and he is currently getting a degree from Harvard University in Strategic Management through an online distance learning program. 

The Kiva loan will allow Salvatore supply new orders and continue growing; Salvatore is requesting aid in financing the purchase of inventory and the purchase of a new professional computer screen.

loans.use: to supply new orders, purchasing inventory and a new professional computer screen.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: José , un hombre emprendedor , tiene 53 años de edad, es casado y vive con su esposa actualmente, el solicito un préstamo con el anhelo de  comprar insumos como abonos, y fumigantes, el desea dar asistencia a los cultivos de café, con la finalidad de mantenerlas en buenas condiciones durante su desarrollo, para obtener un producto de buena calidad , la única delimitación que este caballero tiene es la falta de dinero  para continuar creciendo, ya que de esta actividad económica dependen para poder salir adelante, por lo que él hace una solicitud  de  crédito , y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no registra otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja……
texts.en: Joseph, an entrepreneur, is 53 years old, married and currently lives with his wife.  He applied for a loan with the desire to buy supplies such as fertilizers and fumigants with the intent to cultivate coffee crops.  His goal is to develop the crops and keep them in good condition in order to obtain a high quality product.  This gentleman's only limitation is the lack of funds to continue the growth that his business is dependent upon to get ahead.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan, which will be his first with FUDECOSUR.  He does not have loans with other state banks and FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better conditions and the interest rate is much lower...

loans.use: to buy supplies

location.town: El Ceibo, San Vito, Coto Brus

loans.name: El Encanto Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres microempresarias una de ellas es Magdalena mujer de 51 años de edad, viuda y con tres hijos  adultos. Su negocio es de un vivero de plantas ornamentales en la comarca mata guayaba de Masaya, este negocio lo tiene desde hace 12 años consecutivos, su hijo mayor le ayuda en el negocio, el crédito solicitado lo invertirá en  la compra de rosa príncipe negro, rosa espuma de mar, rosa súper Carmen, rosa colombiana, rosa llamarada, rosa bello firmamento etc., Rita tiene 33 años de edad y su negocio es venta de plantas viveros y Elia tiene 37 años de edad y su negocio es venta de nacatamales.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three micro businesswomen.  One of them is Magdalena.  Magdalena is 51 years old, widowed, and has three adult children.  Her business is running an ornamental plant nursery in the Mata Guayaba district of Masaya.  She has run this business for 12 consecutive years and her eldest son helps her out.  

Magdalena will invest the loan money she has requested in buying "Black Prince' roses, 'Sea Spray' roses, 'Super Carmen' roses, 'Colombian' roses, 'Blaze' roses, ''Beautiful firmament' roses, etc.

Rita is 33 years old and also has a plant nursery business.  Elia is 37 years old and her business is selling tamales.

loans.use: to buy 'Black Prince' roses, 'Sea Spray' roses, 'Super Carmen' roses, 'Colombian' roses, 'Blaze' roses, 'Beautiful Firmament' roses, etc.

loans.name: Patricia

texts.en:
Patricia (“Paty”) is originally from Mexico City, Mexico and moved to the States six years ago. She has eight years of experience in the catering and food market business from her home country of Mexico and five years of experience in the States.

Paty’s business, El Sabor del Taco, specializes in making typical Mexican food such as ceviche, moles, guacamole, tamales, and fresh fruit drinks. Paty currently sells her food at a Saturday farmer’s market. The loan will help Paty expand to start selling at a second farmer’s market on Sundays. In addition to the markets, Paty also sells her moles and tamales to a local grocery store and caters to various offices and embassies in the District. 

Paty will also use the loan funds to cover a year of commercial kitchen rent, design marketing materials, and purchase kitchen equipment and inventory. 

Paty’s future, long-term goal is to open a Mexican restaurant in the District of Columbia.

loans.use: to expand her Mexican food business to additional farmer's markets

loans.name: Dionesia

texts.en:
Dionesia is 51 years old and is married with five children.

Dionesia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional goods like laundry soap, diapers, canned goods, soft drinks, etc. to sell in her general store.

Dionesia has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 12 years and also earns additional income from hog raising.

Dionesia aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods like laundry soap, diapers, canned goods, soft drinks, etc. to sell in her general store

loans.name: Bikhodjal

texts.ru: Бихочал женщина с золотыми руками. Ей 59 лет. Она вдова и имеет 4 совершеннолетних детей. Бихочал имеет 2 вида бизнеса, то есть купле продажей сухофруктов и ткать ковры. Бихочал очень умелая ткачиха. Она производит киргизские ковры. Она имеет постоянных клиентов на местном рынке. Она ткет дорогие ковры из шерсти козы и барана очень дорогие ковры. Ее искусством интересуется многие соотечественники. Она имеет много учеников. Бихочал участвовала во многих конкурсах и получила много наград. Она хочет развевать свой бизнес купле продажи сухофруктов и поэтому запрашивает займ на сумму 7500 сомони для покупки сухофруктов. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Bikhodjal is a woman with hands of gold. She is 59 year old widow and has four adult children. Bikhodjal has two different businesses - she sells dried fruits and weaves rugs. Bikhodjal is a very skilled weaver and makes Kyrgyz style rugs. She has regular clients at the local market. Bikhodjal makes expensive rugs from sheep wool and cashmere goat down. Her artistic craft is popular among the locals and she has her own students. She has participated in many competitions and has won many prizes. But Bikhodjal also wants to expand her dry fruit sales business and is requesting a loan to purchase 7500 somoni to purchase dried fruits in bulk. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits for developing business

loans.name: Khariton

texts.ru:
Молодой бухгалтер Харитон продолжает  торговлю продовольственными и продуктовыми товарами в Севане. С помощью предыдущего кредита от Кива 
Харитон купил и перепродал большое количество сладостей, соков, кофе и других продовольственных товаров. От этой сделки он получил неплохой доход и весь доход он вложил в его новый бизнес. 
В начале года Харитон сдал свой арендованный магазин обратно и арендовал новый слад и начал заниматься оптовой торговлей. Он покупает раз в неделю продукты и продовольственные товары с оптовых складах и рынках Еревана, собирает весь товар в своем арендованном складе в городе Севан и от туда разводит свой товар по магазинам Севанской области. 
Для развития своей оптовой торговли Харитону нужен кредит на сумму 1.000.000 Армянских драм для покупки большой партии кофе, макаронных и кондитерских изделий, сахара для оптовой перепродажи в городе Севан.
texts.en: Khariton is a young accountant who continues to sell groceries and produce in Sevan. Khariton's previous loan with KIVA allowed him to resell a large batch of sweets, juices, coffee and other groceries. He made a tidy profit from that venture which he invested in expanding his inventory and his business. At the beginning of the year Khariton stopped renting his store space and now rents a warehouse and sells groceries in bulk to other grocery stores. He purchases his inventory once a week from warehouses in Yerevan, transports all the purchases in his warehouse in Sevan then delivers them to grocery stores in Sevan area. To expand his whole sale business Khariton needs to borrow 1,000,000 Armenian drahm which he will use to purchase shipments of coffee, pasta and confectioneries as well as sugar for resale in Sevan.

loans.use: To buy a large batch of coffee, pasta products, confectionery, sugar for wholesale resale in Sevan city

loans.name: Almira

texts.en:
Almira is married and she works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell.

Almira has been in this business for 13 years and has previously received funds through Kiva.

Almira successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business.

She aspires to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell.

loans.name: Unurbat

texts.en:
Mr. Unurbat, 26 years old, lives with his family in Ulaanbaatar, capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. He has been working as a policeman for six consecutive years and during this time he was promoted to vice captain. His wife began working as a waitress at a restaurant in January 2013. 

The house they live in has been deteriorating over the years and needs some repair. Especially, roof became so vulnerable that rain drops fall straight to the floor and the walls needs to be encased with bricks as a protection against strong winds and storms. 

So Mr. Unurbat is requesting a loan of 3,000,000 MNT to purchase building and insulation materials such as bricks, planks, fiberglass and foam. Using these materials he can repair and insulate his house, providing his family warmer and more comfortable accommodations. The renovated house will reduce their usage of coal, which will contribute to the efforts against air pollution by emitting less smoke. The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase building and insulation materials such as fiberglass, foam, planks and bricks

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva works hard to support her family. Eva is married and has a used clothing business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 40,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell.

Eva has been in this business for nine years now.

In the future, Eva would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional bundles of used clothes to sell

loans.name: Kamboinse Bonswende Group

texts.fr:
Mme YAMBA dite FATIMATA représente le groupe KAMBOINSE BONSWENDE. Mariée, elle est mère de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a27ans et le moins âgé a 08ans. 02 vont à l’école. Elle a 03personnes en charge.
Mme vend des produits de beauté depuis 08ans. Elle s’approvisionne à Sankar yaar. S es clients sont les femmes et les jeunes.
Elle veut s’acheter 80paquets de mèches et 70boites de pommade.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne ouvrir une grande boutique, mieux s’occuper de la scolarité des enfants.
texts.en:
Ms. YAMBA, who is called FATIMATA, represents group KAMBOINSE BONSWENDE. She is a married mother of six children. The oldest is 27, and the youngest is 8. Two go to school. She has three persons to support. 

Ms. YAMBA has been selling beauty products for eight years. She gets her supplies in Sankar Yaar. Her customers include both women and men. 

She wants to purchase 80 packets of hair extensions and 70 containers of ointment. She wants to save her profits. Her ambition is to open a large store and to do better in covering her children's schooling costs.

loans.use: to purchase hair extensions and ointments to sell

loans.name: San Miguel Arcangel Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres emprendedores, empresarios una de ellas es Cándida mujer de 25 años joven, acompañada y con dos hijos menores, ella se dedica a la venta de ropa y zapatos usados desde hace cinco años, estos los vende en la comunidad y vecinos cercanos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de camisetas de varón, pantalón de varón, pantalón de dama, ropa de niños, zapatos de dama etc. Isaías tiene 23 años y su negocio es venta de ropa usada y Elizabeth tiene 18 años y su negocio es la venta de calzado.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three entrepreneurs.  One of them is Cándida, a 25-year-old woman who's married and has two minor children.  She has made a living for five years selling used clothing and shoes in the community and to nearby neighbors.

She'll invest the loan in buying men's t-shirts and pants, women's pants and shoes, children's clothing, etc.

Isaís, 23, sells used clothing and Elizabeth, 18, sells footwear.

loans.use: to buy clothing and shoes

loans.name: Usar

texts.ru: Усар житель района Шахритуз. Ему 27 лет. У него жена, маленький сын и дочь. Его жена не работает, она ведет домашнее хозяйство. Усар единственный кормилец в семье. Он зарабатывет на жизнь изготовлением деревянных дверей и окон. Одновременно Усар хочет заняться животноводством. Климат его района благоприятствует здесь разведению скота. Усар планирует заняться куплей и продажей крупнорогатого скота. При дворе у него есть коровник и к тому же скотный рынок находится недалеко. Таким образом Усар запрашивает кредит для купли и продажи крупнорогатого скота.
texts.en: Usar lives in Shahrituz region. He is 27 years old, married and has a young son and daughter. His wife does not work and takes care of the household. Usar is the only provider for the family. His trade is making wooden doors and windows. Usar also wants to start a cattle business as his region's climate is good for the large animals. Usar plans to raise and resell cattle for meat production. He owns a cow barn and the livestock market is located close to his home. Usar is requesting a loan to purchase a few animals for his herd.

loans.use: to buy cattle for subsequent resale

loans.name: Dimlawende Group

texts.fr:
Mme D.VIRGINIE représente le groupe DIMLAWENDE. Mariée, elle est mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 08ans et le moins âgé a 05ans. 01 va à l’école.
Mme vend des article de couture (mercerie) depuis 08ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché de secteur 10. S es clients sont les hommes et les femmes.
Elle veut s’acheter 08rouleaux de popeline, 50paquets de fils, 01rouleau de colle, 02paquets d’élastique et des boutons.
Mme veut épargner ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Ms. D.VIRGINIE represents the group DIMLAWENDE. She is a married mother of two children. The oldest is 8 years old, and the youngest is 5. One goes to school. 

Ms. D.VIRGINIE has been selling sewing supplies for eight years. She gets her supplies at the Sector 10 market. Her customers include both men and women.

She wants to purchase 8 rolls of poplin, 5 packets of thread, a roll of tape, 2 packets of elastic, and some buttons. She wants to save her profits. Her ambition is to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase poplin, thread, tape, elastic, and buttons

loans.name: Tiessiri Group

texts.fr:
Les quatre  membres du groupe TIESSIRI sont des femmes mariées ayant une moyenne d’âge de 34  ans, 3 enfants et vivant dans des  familles monogamiques à OUAYERMA I un des quartiers populaires de la ville de Sikasso. 
Elles sont à leur premier prêt avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. 
AMSETOU  1ère à gauche sur la photo fait le commerce de fruits et légumes dans ce groupe de femmes TIESSIRI, sa renommée en la matière fait d’elle une vendeuse très sollicitée. 
Elle compte acheter avec son  prêt des paniers de fruits et légumes. Elle les revend de façon ambulante et en famille, au comptant et à crédit à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako et souvent au grand marché de Sikasso ville.
Elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 17.500FCFA dont une partie est  utilisée  pour payer le prêt et son interêt et l’autre pour mon épargne.
texts.en:
The four members of the group TIESSIRI are married women averaging 34 years of age and three children each living in monogamous families in OUAYERMA I, a working-class district of Sikasso City. The women are on their first loan with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso in order to satisfy the needs of their customer base.

AMSETOU, the first from the left in the photo, does commerce in fruit & vegetables in this group of women. Her renown in this commerce has made her into a vendor who is much in demand. 

With her loan, she intends to purchase baskets of fruit & vegetables. Accepting cash or credit, she resells the goods by going door to door and within the family. Her customer base is composed of men and women. She gets her supplies from Bamako and often at the big market of Sikasso City. 

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 17,500 francs CFA. Part of the profits is used to pay back the loan with interest, and the other part is for [her] savings.

loans.use: to purchase fruit & vegetables

loans.name: Rano

texts.ru: Рано добрая и умная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Она очень любит маленьких детей и поэтому она выбрала профессию воспитателя. Более 15 лет она работает в детском саде. Она профессионал своего дела, и поэтому она отлично справляется со своей работой. Ее коллеги знают ее как добросовестную и жизнерадостную женщину. Она старается улучшить условию проживания, но ее зарплата маленькая. Ее муж работает на заводе и тоже получает маленькую зарплату. Они уже несколько лет планируют отремонтировать дом, не имеют денег. Рано запрашивает займ на сумму 2200 сомони для покупки строительных материалов для проведения ремонта. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Rano is a kinda and smart woman. She is married and has three children. She loves little kids and works as a teacher in a nursery. She has been working in a nursery for 15 years. Rano is very competent and does her work well. Her colleagues know her as a conscientious and energetic woman. Rano wants to improve the life of her own family, but she has a very small salary. Her husband works for a factory and also earn little. For several year they have been planning to perform repairs on their home, but it's hard to save enough money for such a project. Rano is requesting a loan of 2200 somoni to purchase building materials for home repair. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials for house repair

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
Georgina is a married woman with two children. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. Georgina is 43 years old and her children are in school.

Georgina has a buy-and-sell dried coconut meat business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan amount through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell.

Georgina has been in this business for 18 years. In the future, she would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of dried coconut meat to sell.

loans.name: Muhtaram

texts.ru:
Мухтарам жительница Спитаменского района, города Худжанд, который находится в севере Таджикистана. Мухтарам замужняя 45-летная женщина. Она живет с мужем. Мухтарам считает себя самой счастливой женщиной (матерью), у нее двое детей, одна девочка и мальчик. Муж клиента работает в городе Худжанд, дочь клиентки ткачиха. Ее младший сын находится в Российской Федерации. Он помогает своим родителям, отправляет деньги ежемесячно. Невестка Мухтарам живет вместе с ними, она работает в детском садике. Сама Мухтарам вместе со своей семьей занимается растениеводством у себя при доме. В этой области она десять лет. Отец Мухтарамы тоже живет с ними, он работает в колхозе бригадиром. 
Мухтарам берет кредит для того чтобы заняться животноводством. Данным бизнесом она будет заниматься в собственном доме. На полученный кредит Мухтарам намерена купить 2 голов крупнорогатого скота и корма.
texts.en: Muhtaram is a resident of Khujand city, Spitamen region in northern Tajikistan. Muhtaram is a married 45 year old woman who lives with her husband. Muhtaram thinks of herself as a happy woman - she is a mother of two children, a boy and a girl. Her husband works in Khujand and her daughter works as a weaver. Her youngest son is a migrant worker in Russia and he sends money monthly to help his parents. The son's young wife lives with the family and works for the local nursery school. Muhtaram is a farmer and her whole family helps her. She has been making a living as a farmer for ten years. Muhtaram's father also lives with the family, he work as a supervisor for the farming co-op. Muhtaram is requesting a loan to purchase cows because she wants to expand into ranching. She will be able to raise the animals in her home. Muhtaram is planning to buy two cows and feed for them.

loans.use: to purchase two cows and feed for them for the purpose of starting a new business

loans.name: Hilola

texts.ru: Хилола добросовестная, целеустремлённая и трудолюбивая женщина. Ей 33 года. Она родилась в сельской местности, которое имеет хорошее условие для животноводства и выращивания сельскохозяйственных культур. Семья Хилолы была  малообеспеченной и она с детства помогала родителям по скотоводству и выращивания сельхоз культуры. Сама Хилола перенесла много трудности жизни, так как жила в малообеспеченной семье. После окончания средней школы Хилола вышла замуж и помогала мужу по животноводству и выращиванием сельхоз культур. В основном они занимались скотоводством, то есть из базара покупали скот по низкой цене, на определённое время откармливали  и перепродали по высокой цене. Из-за неблагополучной погоды и климата их бизнес не дал положительных результатов, Поэтому муж Хилолы уехал на заработки Федерацию Россию. До этого семья Хилолы проживали только на доходы из животноводства. После чего Хилола сама начала заниматься животноводством. Хилола  держит скот за счёт кормов произведённых им самым. В прошлом году муж Хилолы приехал из России и на определённое время помогал жене по ведению бизнеса по скотоводству. В настоящее время муж Хилолы опять хочет уехать в Россию на заработки. Поэтому Хилола обращалась  в нашу организацию с целью получения займа для покупки авиабилета для мужа, а сама хочет продолжать бизнес по скотоводству.  Хилола надеется на Вашу благотворительность и милосердие.
texts.en: Hilola is a conscientious, goal oriented and hard working woman. She is 33 years old. She was born in the country side where the climate is supportive of raising cattle and growing many kinds of crops. Hilola's family was poor and she has helped her parents take care of animals and crops since early childhood. Her life has always been hard because her family was so poor. After finishing high school Hilola married and started helping her husband to raise animals and farm. They primarily raise meat cattle by purchasing smaller animals at the livestock market, fattening them then selling the animals with a profits after a certain time. Due to bad weather their cattle business was not successful and Hilola's husband went to Russia to find work. Before he left Hilola's family lived only from their livestock earnings. After her husband left Hilola continued raising animals and now fattens the animals using the feed she grows herself. Last year Hilola's husband returned from Russia to help his wife take care of the cattle. Now he wants to go back to Russia for work. Hilola has turned to Kiva for a loan so that she can purchase airfare for her husband. She herself will continue raising cattle at home. Hilola hopes for your charity and kindness.

loans.use: To buy air ticket for her husband who wants to find work in Russia

loans.name: Rosibel

texts.es: Rosibel, tiene la edad  de 47 años, está casada  actualmente. Ella con el crédito pretende comprar almacigo de café, abonos y fumigaciones para asistir una plantación de café. Ella tiene pensado sembrar el café en una pequeña propiedad que tiene actualmente para en un futuro obtener una buena producción  con ello mayores ingresos y una mejor calidad de vida y una estabilidad económica. Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Rosibel, 47, is currently married.

With the loan she plans to buy coffee seedlings, soil amendments, and fumigants to help her coffee farm.  She plans to plant the coffee on a small piece of property she has so she'll get a good crop in the future and, with that, more income, a better quality of life, and economic stability.  

This is her first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She had not had other loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR offered her a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy seedlings

loans.name: Mehry

texts.ru: Мехри 53 года. Она замужем и имеет 4 детей. Она трудолюбивая женщина и старается всегда найти источника дохода и таким образом улучшить условию проживания. Мехри более 12 лет занимается скотоводством. Она очень хорошо справляется с бизнесом, так как имеет большой опыт. Ее муж помогает ей введение бизнеса. Дополнительно они занимаются выращиванием сельхоз культуры. Она хочет развивать бизнес дальше, но не имеет денег для покупки скота, чтобы увеличить количество скота. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Mehry is 53 years old, married and has four children. She is a hardworking woman who is always looking for new ways to make money and improve the life of her family. Mehry has been raising cattle for 12 years. She excels at taking care of her animals because she has a lot of experience. He husband helps Mehry with the herd. In addition they also grow crops on their plot. Mehry wants to expand her business but does not have enough savings to buy more animals. She is requesting 6000 somoni to purchase more cattle. Mehry awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle for expanding her herd

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy white flannel

loans.name: Elvia Yaneth

texts.es:
Elvia tiene 33 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene tres hijos de 8, 5 y 3 años de edad respectivamente. Ella realizas los oficios domésticos en su casa y elabora adobe desde hace ochos años, tiempo que tiene de estar con su compañero de vida, él le enseño este oficio y lo elaboraran en verano; por que en invierno es difícil hacerlo por el secado. Se dedican a esta actividad, ya que no tienen mucha opción de emprender otra actividad para generar ingresos para su familia.  Los materiales que necesita, los adquiere en una ciudad que esta a cinco kilómetros de casa y debe pagar un vehiculo para transportarlos; ya que en donde vive no hay transporte publico.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar doce sacos de fertilizantes, herbicidas y fungicidas y para pagar el alquiler de 21,000 metros cuadrados de terreno para cultivar. Así, podrá cultivar a tiempo y tendrá la seguridad que nadie le quite el terreno para realizar sus cultivos; y obtener una buena cosecha que le permita construir su propia casa; debido a que en donde vive es casa de sus suegros y no tienen privacidad y también desea brindarles el estudio a su hijos.
texts.en:
Elvia is 33 years old, lives with her partner, and has three children who are 8, 5 and 3 years old.  She has been carrying out her housework and making adobe bricks for 8 years.  She has been together with her life partner for 8 years and he is the one who taught her this trade.  The couple make their products in the summer because it is difficult to dry them in the winter.  Elvia and her partner work in this business because they don't have many options for undertaking another business in order to make income for their family.  They acquire the materials that they need in a city which is located 5 kilometers from their home and they need to pay somebody to transport the materials in their vehicle because there is no public transport in their area.

Elvia is requesting a loan from Fundación Campo to buy 12 sacks of fertilizers, herbicides and fungicides.  She will also pay the rent on 21,000 sq. m. of land that she will grow crops on.  This will enable her to grow her crops according to schedule and she will have the security of knowing that nobody else will take away the land she needs for growing her crops.  She will enjoy a good yield which will allow her to build her own home as she currently lives in her in-laws' home and has no privacy.  In addition, she would like to provide her children with an education.

loans.use: to buy 12 sacks of fertilizers, herbicides and fungicides, and to pay the rent on 21,000 sq. m. of land for cultivation

loans.name: Maria Lucia

texts.es:
María es una mujer joven de 22 años de edad casada, madre de una hija la cual es menor de edad, ama de casa y agricultora desde hace 5 años catalogada por su esposo como una mujer luchadora e inteligente ya que es ella quien lleva la administración de los bienes de su pareja el cual es caficultor  desde muy joven. Ella tiene un grado de educación primaria no completado cursado hasta el quinto grado de la primaria y no pudo seguir estudiando ya que sus padres son de bajos recursos económicos y no la pudieron seguir apoyando por lo tanto decidieron enseñarle a trabajar la tierra en el cultivo de granos básicos y otros ya que este ha sido un medio de ingreso para sus padres y en la actualidad para su familia. 

Actualmente solicita ayuda para la compra de un panel solar el cual lo ha anhelado desde hace mucho tiempo ya que en el lugar donde ella habita no hay energía eléctrica y considera que hoy en día es necesario tener iluminado su hogar por lo que durante mucho tiempo ella ha luchado con sus oficios domésticos y cotidianos en compañía de luz con candela comercial o/y luz con astillas de madera de pino.

Su sueño es lograr con el paso de los años la superación de su hija, que ella pueda tener establecida su vida y su futuro ya que con la labor y el esfuerzo de su trabajo en compañía de su pareja ella pueda alcanzar todos sus propósitos y todas sus metas. Con la compra del panel solar ella podrá tener iluminado su hogar estar más en contacto con el mundo y ya no levantarse por las mañanas a oscuras ya que por medio de este proyecto con solo presionar un interruptor ella y su familia tendrán iluminación en su hogar.
texts.en:
María is a young woman, 22 years old, married and the mother of a young daughter. She has been a housewife and farmer for five years. Her husband characterizes her as an intelligent and tenacious woman because it is she who manages her partner’s property. He has been a coffee grower since very young. 

Maria did not finish her primary education and studied until the fifth grade but was not able to continue in school because her parents lacked the resources to continue supporting her. Consequently, they decided to teach her how to work the earth by cultivating basic grains and other crops as that had been a source of income for them and currently is for María’s own family.

Now she is requesting help to purchase solar panels which she has yearned to have for a long time because the place where she lives does not electricity and she feels that nowadays it is necessary to have lights in her home. She has struggled for a long time to perform her household tasks every day by candlelight or/and by the light of chips of pine wood.

Her dream is that over time her daughter will be successful and that through her work and effort, along with her partner, she will be able to have a stable life and future and achieve all of her goals. With the purchase of solar panels she will be able to illuminate her home and will be more in contact with the world; she will no longer have to get up in the dark in the mornings since by only pressing a switch, she and her family will have lights in their home.

loans.use: to purchase solar panels for her home.

loans.name: Concepcion

texts.en:
Concepcion is 49 years old, married, with five children.

Concepcion is in the agricultural business, raising pigs in the Philippines. Concepcion requested a PHP 13,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

Concepcion has been raising pigs for seven years now and has borrowed eight times in the past from NWTF and, more recently, from Kiva to sustain the business. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money, so she can continue to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy medicines and vaccines for her pigs.

loans.name: Yessenia

texts.es: Yessenia, de 25 años de edad , esta casada y tiene un pequeño bebé de poco meses de nacido, por el momento vive en casa de sus padres a lado de ellos y sus hermanos de 20 y 16 años, ella junto a sus padres trabajan mucho para poder surgir y tener una mejor calidad de vida.El trabajo de Yessenia consiste en la tapicería ,trabaja en la elaboración o refacción de asientos y toldos de vehículos como motos y mototaxis. Tiene un local en su casa en donde funciona su negocio desde hace 3 años. Cuenta con la ayuda de su padre ya que ambos invirtieron económicamente para emprender este trabajo. Ella a parte de trabajar administrando el negocio familiar también estudia en una universidad de la ciudad aunque ahora por su estado no acude con normalidad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede estar a lado de las personas que mas quiere ya que es un negocio familiar .En esta oportunidad solicitará S/ 3000, por tanto agradece a quienes hacen posible su acceso a este financiamiento ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su trabajo, por otro lado se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de forma puntual.Con el monto solicitado comprará materiales para tapicería, entre ellos esponjas, agujas especiales, hilos, lonas, triplay, pegamentos y otros elementos que necesita para hacer su trabajo.
texts.en:
Yessenia, 25, is married and has a small baby only a few months old.  At the moment she lives in her parents' house with them and her siblings, ages 20 and 16.  She and her parents work a lot to be able to progress and have a better quality of life.

Yessenia's job is upholstery.  She works making and repairing seats and tarps for vehicles such as motorcycles and motorcycle taxis.  She has a place in her house where her business has operated for three years.  She has her father's help because they both invested financially to set up this work.

In addition to running the family business, she also attends a university in the city, although because of her current situation she's not attending regularly.  What she likes about her job is being able to be close to the people she loves the most, because it's a family business.

Currently she'll request 3000 soles [PEN].  She's grateful to those who make it possible for her to get this loan because she'll feel more secure about making progress in her work.  She also promises to make her payments punctually.

With the requested amount she'll buy upholstery materials, including sponge, special needles, thread, canvas, three-ply wood, glue, and other items she needs to do her work.

loans.use: to buy special needles, thread, canvas, and other materials

loans.name: Mi Morenita Flat Group

texts.es:
Rocio se dedica al comercio desde hace 6 años, ella platica que siempre le ha gustado vender ya que gana su dinero, lo realiza en sus tiempos libres y ha hecho buenas amistades.

Rocio se dedica a la venta de ropa de segunda, ella realiza sus ventas de casa en casa, sale con sus maletas a vender sus productos, ella dice que aveces sin salir a ofrecer la gente acude a comprar sus productos porque ya le conocen.

Ella invertirá este crédito en la compra de pacas de ropa(camisas, blusas, pantalones, short, playeras, vestidos, faldas) para continuar con sus ventas. 

Rocio espera a futuro poder construir un local en su hogar en el cual pondrá su negocio para ya no tener que salir a vender, también espera que sus hijas tengan la oportunidad de continuar con sus estudios.

Rocio pertenece a un grupo llamado Mi Morenita se encuentra ubicado en la comunidad de paso rincón, el cual  esta rodeado por sembradíos de limón ya que muchas de las personas de esta comunidad se dedican al cultivo del mismo.

los otros tres integrantes del grupo son:
Francisco siembra y cultivo de limón, 
Fabiana siembra y cultivo de limón,
Juana venta de cosmeticos.
texts.en:
Rocio has been a second-clothing seller for the past 6 years. She says that she has always liked selling because she can make money, do it in her free time, and has made good friends. Rocio sells second-hand clothing door-to-door. She takes her suitcases and goes out to sell her products. She says that sometimes, without leaving her home, people go to her house to buy from her because they know her.

She will invest her loan in buying bundles of clothing (shirts, blouses, pants, shorts, t-shirts, dresses, and skirts) to continue selling. 

Rocio hopes that, in the future, she will be able to build a store in her house from which she can run her business, and in that way, she won't have to go out to sell. She also hopes that her daughters will have the opportunity to continue studying.

Rocio belongs to a group called Mi Morenita which is located in the community of Paso Rincón. Paso Rincón is surrounded by lime orchards and many people from the area work in the orchards. 

The other three members of the group are:
Francisco, who sows and harvests limes.
Fabiana, who also sows and harvests limes
Juana, who sells cosmetics

loans.use: to buy bundles of clothing (shirts, blouses, pants, shorts, t-shirts, dresses, and skirts) to sell.

location.town: Paso Rincon, San Juan Bautista Tuxtepec, Oaxaca

loans.name: Palomas Group

texts.es:
Zeferina es integrante de un grupo llamado Palomas, ella tiene la edad de 47 años, estudio secundaria y esta 
casada con Jorge que es mecánico, ellos tuvieron 2 hijos los cuales son mayores de edad.

Zeferina platica que por mas de 30 años su esposo se a dedicado a ser mecánico, el repara los motores de lanchas. Ella dice que decidieron poner este taller ya que su comunidad esta a la orilla de la presa de Cerro 
de oro y mucha gente se dedica a la pesca, ademas de que no había un taller de este tipo en su comunidad. 

Ella comenta que les va bien con su taller, ya que, es uno de los pocos talleres que existen en la comunidad,  y muchos pescadores acuden para que su esposo les de mantenimiento o repare sus motores. 

Zeferina esta muy contenta ya que por medio de esta actividad han logrado sacar a delante a su familia y construir su casa, Un crédito de visión Fund le ayudara a comprar  variedad de refacciones para motor y aceite. 

A futuro les gustaría montar una refaccionaria grande en su hogar.

El grupo las palomas esta integrado por 7 personas alegres y emprendedoras, además de Zeferina, sus compañeras son:

Martha venta de antojitos, 
Alejandra venta de comida,
Virginia venta de antojitos, 
Maria Angelica Venta de perfumes, 
Reynalda venta de zapatos, 
Rosalia venta de zapatos.
texts.en:
Zeferina is a member of a group called “Las Palomas.” She is 47 years old and has a secondary education. She is married to Jorge, who is a mechanic and they have two children, who are now adults.

Zeferina notes that for more than 30 years her husband has been a mechanic. He repairs the motors of boats. She says they decided to open this shop because her community is located on the banks of the Cerro de Oro reservoir where many people fish. In addition, there was no other shop of this kind in their community.

She notes that the shop has done well because it is one of the few shops that exist in the area and many fishermen come to her husband so that he can maintain and repair their boats.

Zeferina is very happy because through this business they have succeeded in helping their family get ahead and in building their house. A loan from the Vision Fund would help them to purchase a variety of replacement parts for motors and oil.

In the future she would like to open a large repair shop in her home.

The group, Las Palomas, is composed of 7 happy and enterprising people besides Zeferina. Her fellow members are:

Martha, who sells snacks
Alejandra, who sells meals
Virginia, who sells snacks
Maria Angelina, who sells perfume
Reynalda, shoe seller
Rosalia, shoe seller

loans.use: to repair the motors of boats and to buy spare parts for motors and oil.

loans.name: Mulya Sari Group

texts.en:
Ni Ketut lives in the village of Berawantangi, west Bali. Ni Ketut is helping her husband, who works as a farmer, get income by running a pig business by her home.

In order to expand her business, Ni Ketut raised capital by way of joining the Mulya Sari group where she was also chosen by the other members as the head of the group and they work together with MUK to get business loans for pig farmers.

With the loan of 1.8M IDR per person, Ni Ketut is planning to buy three piglets with the price of 500,000 IDR each. Although the price of feed is currently very expensive, Ni Ketut expects the eventual sale of the three pigs would later gain a satisfactory profit and can support the education of her child.

loans.use: To purchase three local piglets

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 7 años y eso le ha dado la capasidad y el conocimiento necesario para asistir sus cultivos, su principal siembra es el maiz y el maicillo, comercializa sus cultivos en agencias de compra-venta de granos basicos que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganacias que obtiene de sus ventas ayuda en los gastos que su familia tiene, vive en casa de sus padres, con la abuela y sus hermanos los cuales le ayudan a trabajar en la agricultura, cuando pasa la temporada agricola el cliente se dedica a trabajar en construccion, el esta slicitando un credito para poder comparar insumos agricolas que le ayuden en la siembra de sus cultivos como: abonos, semillas, fertilizantes y asi poder tener mejores ganacias y seguir ayudando el los gastos de su casa sin ninguna limitacion.
texts.en: This loan client has been working in agriculture for 7 years, and this has given him the competence and the knowledge necessary to tend to his crops. His principal plantings are corn and sorghum. He sells his crops to agencies that buy and sell basic grains that are located near the place where he lives. With the earnings that he obtains from his sales, he helps with his family's expenses. He lives in his parents' house, with his grandmother and his siblings, who help him with the agricultural work. When the agricultural season has passed, he works in construction. He is applying for a loan to be able to buy agricultural supplies that will help him in the planting of his crops, such as compost, seeds, fertilizers, and thus he will be able to have better earnings and continue helping with the household expenses without any constraints.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies such as compost, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente se dedica a la agricultura sus principales cultivos son el frijol y el maicillo desde hace 3 años, es un hombre muy responsable, actualmente vive con su mama y sus hermanos en casa propia,el cliente desea incrementar sus ventas y por eso a solicitado un crédito el cual le permita comprar: semillas, abonos, entre otras cosas, para seguir ayudando a su familia en los gastos que se le presentan
texts.en: The client has made a living from agriculture for three years.  His main crops are beans and sorghum. He is a very responsible man. He currently lives with his mother and his siblings in their own house. The client wishes to increase his sales and for this reason is requesting a loan which will allow him to buy seeds and compost, among other things, so he can continue helping his family with the expenses they have.

loans.use: to purchase agricultural supplies

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El cliente vive con su mamá en casa propia, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 6 años las cosechas que siembra las va almacenado en los graneros que aparecen en la foto y despues sale a comercializarlos a los diferentes mercados que estan cerca de su lugar de residencia y con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda a su mama en los gastos de la casa, el cliente solicita un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas como: semilla, abonos, fertilizantes, entre otras cosas ya que ese es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi seguir ayudando en los gastos de su casa y en sus gastos personales.
texts.en:
This borrower lives with his mother in a house they own. He has worked in agriculture for six years, storing his harvests in the containers shown in the picture. He then visits different marketplaces that are located close to his house and sells them. With the profits he makes, he helps his mother with the home expenses.

He is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies, such as seeds, compost and fertilizers. This is his only activity and he wants to continue helping at home and be able to cover his own expenses.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia con sus 2 hijos, ella se dedica a la agricultura siembra maiz y frijol desde hace 3 años cuando ya esta lista su cosecha la almacena en lo graneros que aparecen detras de ella en la foto y despues sale a comercializarlos con los vendedores de granos basicos que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia y con las ganancias qu obtiene logra salir adelante con sus dos hijo, La clienta solicita un credito para poder comprar insumos agricolas: abonos, fertilizantes, semillas y demas herramientas que le sirven para hacer su cosecha y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias y seguir dandole a sus hijos lo necesario y solventar los gastos de su hogar
texts.en: This borrower lives in her own house with her 2 children. She is a farmer and she has been planting corn and beans for 3 years. Once she has harvester her crops she stores them in the granaries you can see at her back in the picture, and then she sells them to basic grains retailers of her community. She uses what she earns to provide for her two children. She is requesting a loan to buy agricultural items such as manure, fertilizers, seeds and other tools she needs for her crops, in order to earn a better income, thus keeping on providing for her children and paying for her family’s expenses.

loans.use: To buy manure, fertilizers, seeds.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma, a 42-year-old widowed mother of six children, five of whom are in school, is a very hard working entrepreneur. The operator of a rice retailing business in the Philippines for four years, she has requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

In the future, Gemma would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of rice to sell.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta, a married woman, works hard to support her family. The operator of a bakery business in the Philippines for five years, she has requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy ingredients for her bakery.

In the future, Julieta would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her bakery.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive con su padre, madre y hermanos,en casa propia es una persona muy trabajadora, tiene un puesto de antojito en su lugar de residencia elabora papas fritas, yuca frita, empanadas, pastelitos rellenos de carne, etc. con las ganancias que obtiene ayuda a su familia en los gastos de la casa, la clienta pide financiamiento para la compra de productos que utiliza en la elaboracion de sus antojitos como: aceite, papas, maiz para los pastelitos, platanos, verduras y todo los ingredientes para su elaboracion y asi poder seguir ayunado en su casa y sus cubrir sus gastos personales.
texts.en: This client lives with her parents and siblings in their own home. She is a very hard working person and operates an antojito (snack) stand out of her home. She makes fried potatoes, fried yucca, empanadas (pastries filled with meat), etc.  With her earnings she helps her family with the household expenses. She is requesting a loan to buy the ingredients she uses to make her antojitos such as oil, potatoes, corn for the pastries, bananas, and vegetables. This way she will be able to continue helping with the household expenses as well as cover her personal expenses.

loans.use: purchase ingredients such as oil, potatoes, corn, bananas and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la clienta vive con su tia y su hija ella posee un negocio cerca de su lugar de residencia es muy trabajadora y responsable vende todo tipo de medicina natural y tiene mucha cleintela pues sus productos son muy buenos, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su casa y poderle dar a su hija lo que necesita. La clienta solicta un credito que le permita poder comprar mas mercaderia y asi obtener mas ganancias para poder darle a su hija un vida mejor y seguir aportando en la casa para lo que se pueda necesitar
texts.en:
This borrower lives with her aunt and her daughter. She has a business that is near her home. The borrower is a hardworking and responsible individual who sells all types of natural medicines. She has many customers because her products are very good. With the income she generates from her sales, she is able to cover some of her household expenses and provide her daughter with what she needs.

The borrower is requesting a loan so that she can buy more merchandise. As a result, she will generate more earnings so that she can provide a better life for her daughter and continue to maintain her home by acquiring what is needed.

loans.use: to buy natural products to sell.

loans.name: Kenia Mariela

texts.es: Kenia es una mujer microempresaria con grandes ansias de superación en su negocio ella es una mujer casada, tiene 24 años de edad, tiene dos años de dedicarse a vender ropa y cosméticos de la Avon los vende en su domicilio, ambulantes y a la comunidad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de cosméticos de la Avon como crema para manos, cremas para cuerpos, cremas faciales, perfume 300 km por hora, así también como ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de dama, bóxer de varón, bikinis, brazieres, etc.
texts.en: Kenia is a small-businesswoman with great desire to improve her business.  She is a married, 24 year old, woman.  She has worked selling clothes and Avon cosmetics in her home, by delivery, and in the community.  She will invest the credit through buying Avon cosmetics like hand, body, and facial cremes, and the perfume "300 km/hr," as well as clothes like men's pants and boxers, and women's pants, bikinis, and bras, etc.

loans.use: to buy Avon cosmetics like hand, body, and facial cremes, and the perfume "300 km/hr."

loans.name: Maryfel

texts.en:
Maryfel works hard to support her family. Maryfel is married and has a bread vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 7 years now.

Maryfel requested a 30000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. to buy more bread to sell.

In the future, Maryfel would like to save enough to buy farm land.

loans.use: to buy more bread to sell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina works hard to support her family. Gina is married and has a buy-and-sell used clothing business in the Philippines. Gina has been in this business for 17 years now, and also earns additional income from another business.

Gina requested a 30000 PHP loan through NWTF to purchase more used clothing to sell.

In the future, Gina would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more used clothing to sell.

loans.name: Eneria

texts.en:
Eneria is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines.  She is married with five children.

Eneria is a farmer and grows assorted crops/vegetables to earn a living. She has been doing this for four years. She has requested a loan to acquire a parcel of cocoland (plot of land with coconut trees). 

Eneria has been a member of PMPC for almost nine years.

loans.use: to acquire a parcel of cocoland (plot of land with coconut trees).

loans.name: Guillerma

texts.en:
Guillerma is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a food stall in the Philippines. She has taken out loans before from NWTF and successfully paid them back. She is now applying for a further loan of 15,000 PHP to buy spices to sell in her stall.

NWTF is relisting Guillerma's business profile in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy spices to sell in her food stall.

loans.name: Osor

texts.en:
Mr. Osor, 32 years old, lives with his wife and two children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. The family resides in their own house on a plot of land. From 2002 to 2012, Osor operated a taxi service for local people, and in early 2013, he became employed as a carpenter at a workshop. The house they live in has deteriorated, and in winter time, they burn a great deal of coal to heat the house. Osor has therefore decided to purchase and install a project heater which is energy efficient and uses less coal for heating. Also, he wants to add insulation to his house because strong winds and storms seep through the walls and roof, chilling them to their cores.

In order to purchase insulation materials and the heater, Osor is requesting a loan of 6000000 MNT. These purchases will allow the family to live in a warm and comfortable home. More importantly, the family will burn less coal, emit less smoke and thus contribute to the efforts against air pollution.

The borrower is a very hardworking individual who strives for a better future.

loans.use: to purchase a heater and insulation materials such as foam and fiberglass.

loans.name: Marco Vladimir

texts.es:
MARCO tiene 30 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los familiares en chimbo Provicnia de Bolívar.

MARCO  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, abonos, semillas. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos para la agricultura. Las compras las realizará en Chimbo.

El sueño es mejorar el nivel de vida. Los desafíos a los que se enfremta es la competencia. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbool.
texts.en: Marco, 30, is single and has no children. He lives with relatives in Chimbo, Bolivar Province. He works in agriculture and plants corn. He is applying for the loan to buy urea, insecticides, manure, and seeds. With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy farming supplies. He will make the purchases in Chimbo. His dream is to improve his quality of life. The challenge he confronts is competition. In his free time, he likes to play soccer.

loans.use: to buy urea, insecticides, manure, and seeds.

loans.name: Maria Manuela

texts.es:
María tiene 34 años de edad estado civil casada tiene 6 hijos, vive con el esposo y lo hijos en el Cantón Guaranda Provincia de Bolívar.

María Se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra y venta de naranjilla. Además se dedica a la crianza de ganado. Utilizara el dinero del crédito para comprar fertilizantes, insumo, urea, herbicidas.
 
Con el crédito que le otorga la cooperativa podra mejorar los cultivos. Las compras las realizará en el cantón Guaranda. El sueño es que este nuevo año sea de mejores cosechas de productos de naranjilla. 

Los desafíos a los que se enfrentan son no poder comunicarse no tener medio de transporte y el mal clima y las plagas. En el tiempo libre se dedica a pasear por el campo.
texts.en:
María, 34, is married and lives with her husband.  She has six children.  She lives in Guaranda Canton in the province of Bolívar.

María makes a living growing and selling naranjilla.  She also raises livestock.  She'll use the money from the loan to buy fertilizer, urea, and herbicides.  

With the loan from the co-op she'll improve her crop.  Her dream is to have better naranjilla harvests.

The challenges she faces are not being able to communicate, not having transportation, the weather, and pests.  She spends her free time visiting with neighbors.

loans.use: to purchase farming inputs such as fertilizers, urea, and herbicides

loans.name: Jessica

texts.en:
Jessica is 27 years old and married with one child. She has been raising pigs for three years and earns additional income from her food stall.

Jessica is applying for a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She is working tirelessly to earn more money to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Finito Group

texts.es: Este grupo formado por tres empresarias de éxito una de ellas es Otilia mujer acompañada, con 36 años de edad  su esposo y ella de manera ambulante venden productos varios  como utensilios de cocinas de plásticos, plateras etc desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo solicita para invertir en artículos de cocinas de plásticos como cubetas plásticas, platos plásticos, comideras, bacinillas grandes, coladores pequeños,  coladores grandes, prensa ropa, plateras, bote pequeños con chorro etc. Gloria tiene 40 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de productos plásticos del hogar y Tomasa tiene 46 años de edad y su negocio es tener un taller de zapatería.
texts.en:
This group is composed of three successful entrepreneurs. One of these is Otilia, who has  a partner. She is 36 years old. She and her husband are street vendors who have been selling various products such as plastic kitchen utensils, silver, etc. for six years. 

She is requesting a loan to invest in plastic kitchen articles such as plastic trays, plastic plates, eats, large bedpans, small colanders, large colanders, clothing pressers, silver, small containers with spouts, etc.

Gloria is 40 years old and her business is the sale of plastic products for the home and Tomasa is 46 years old and her business is a shoe shop.

loans.use: to puchase plastic kitchen utensis such as plastic trays, plastic plates, eats, large bedpans, small colanders, large colanders, clothes pressers, silver, small containers with spouts, etc.

loans.name: El Jardin Group

texts.es:
La señora Ambrosia es casada, de 40 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la compra, crianza y venta de cerdos, inició este negocio comprando 2 cerditos y hasta el momento lleva 10 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es comerciante.

Organiza un grupo para poder solicitar un prestamo que lo utilizará para la compra de 6 cerditos para criarlos y luego venderlos, en el futuro quiere tener una granja con mas cerdos de lo que ahora tiene; las demás integrantes del grupo se dedican a vender animales y al comercio.
texts.en:
Ambrosia, 40, is married.  She didn't have the opportunity to study.  She makes a living buying, raising, and selling pigs.  She started this business with two piglets and now has 10 years of experience.  She has the help of her husband, a merchant.

She's organizing a group to be able to request a loan she'll use to buy six piglets to raise and sell.

In the future she wants to have a farm with more pigs than she has now.

The other members of the group make a living selling animals and in the commercial sector.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Admir

texts.en:
Admir is a twenty-two-year-old single male living in Kosovo with the rest of his family. For a long time, he worked as a hairdresser for others so that he could get experience. Now he runs his own business as a hairdresser in his area.

Admir's hair salon needs some renovation. He is not able to do the renovation, so he is requesting a loan for a general renovation of his hair salon.

This loan will help Admir to develop his business and increase his clientele. He will use the income generated from the business to support his family and to save for his future. In the future, he plans to develop his business more and to expand by opening another salon and hiring his own employees. He is very happy for this opportunity and thanks all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: To renovate his hair salon

loans.name: Demetria

texts.en:
Demetria is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a hog raising business in the Philippines. She is borrowing 20000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Demetria successfully paid back her previous loan and is now requesting a new loan to further build her business. NWTF is re-listing Demetria's business profile again in support of her efforts to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace is 41 years old and lives in South Poblacion, Plaridel. She is married with one child. 

Mary Grace has a shop that sells groceries and beverages. She has had this business for 8 years. She requested a loan to purchase additional stock to sell - 15 boxes of assorted groceries and 15 cases of soft drinks.

Mary Grace has been a member of PMPC for 5 years. In the future, Mary Grace hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase 15 boxes of assorted groceries and 15 cases of soft drinks.

location.town: Plaridel - So. Pob. Plaridel, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Ma. Analie

texts.en:
Ma. Analie is 42 years old and married with three children, one of whom is in school. Ma. Analie works very hard to provide for them.

Ma. Analie runs a general store in the Philippines. Ma. Analie has been in this business for 2 years and requested a loan of 10000 PHP loan through NWTF to re-stock her store with food and household items to sell, like canned goods, soap, shampoo, eggs, and noodles.

In the future, Ma. Analie would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to re-stock her store with food and household items to sell, like canned goods, soap, shampoo, eggs, and noodles.

loans.name: Virginia Jeannette

texts.es:
Virginia, solicita un nuevo crédito por la necesidad de seguir invirtiendo más en el negocio y así para  atender a los clientes. Este le ayudara a comprar aceite, harina, maíz, gas propano, entre otros productos. 
El préstamo anterior le permitió tener todo lo necesario para ofrecerles  variedad de mercadería a sus clientes y así ellos se sientan satisfechos. Las condiciones económicas han mejorado y las circunstancias familiares se han optimizado, ya que tienen una mejor estabilidad de vida que antes.
texts.en:
Virginia requests a new loan because she needs to keep on investing in her business so she can serve her customers well. This loan will help her to purchase olive oil, flour, corn and propane gas, among other supplies.
The previous loan allowed her to have everything she needed in order to offer a wide variety of products to her customers. That way they feel satisfied. Her financial conditions have improved. Also, her family's situation has been better, since their living conditions are more stable than before.

loans.use: to purchase olive oil, flour, corn and propane gas, among other supplies.

loans.name: Hector Renan

texts.es:
El Señor Héctor es una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive  con su esposa y 2 hijos en una comunidad de Choluteca en la zona sur de  Honduras. 
Don Héctor su negocio es  la   producción  de  granos  básicos, con el préstamo espera comprar 1 batería  y un televisor  ya que la batería que tenia actualmente le dejo de funcionar y la necesita para poder recargar sus artículos electrónicos, porque en la comunidad donde vive no hay servicio de energia electrica y este prestamo le ayudaria a suplir un poco esta necesidad.
Don  Héctor  espera que con esta inversión mejore un poco su  calidad  de vida  y la de su familia, y a la vez poder seguir  apoyando   a  su familia y a sus hijos para que se  conviertan en personas de bien y con mejores oportunidades en la sociedad. 	




Choluteca, Honduras  –  Marzo  del   2013
texts.en:
Héctor is a responsible, hardworking, and honest person.  He lives with his wife and two children in the community of Choluteca in the southern part of Honduras.  Héctor works producing basic grains.  

Héctor is requesting this loan to purchase a battery and a television since the battery he currently has stopped working and he needs it to recharge his electronics, because in his town there is no electricity and this loan will help him fulfill this need.

Héctor hopes that this investment improves his family's quality of life a little in the short term.  He hopes that his life improves and he can continue supporting his family so that they can become good people with better opportunities in society.
